segments.text: I observe the woman methodically drying the plate by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water edges over and cascades down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms slowly on the tiled floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands with one foot in it, expression unchanged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy ascends the two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool shifts slightly under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He extends his arm into the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby holds her hand out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window revealing the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the way to a distant fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR
